name: Super adventure
description:
Players will play as special forces and carry out dangerous and tense tasks
You need to search for nearby weapons as soon as possible
Pick up your weapon! Eliminate the enemy!
Game operation mode
Forward=W
Back=S
Move Left=A
Move Right=D
Game features
-Easy and simple game challenges, with a simple and joyful gaming style.
-Rich weapons and equipment, massive enemies, and freedom to engage in various gameplay.
-Challenging and stimulating, waiting for you to explore and experience
-The game features realistic scenes in terms of graphics, providing players with a more delicate and realistic shooting experience in real combat
-Provide a super large map, experience rich environmental changes, and let you feel passion
